description: On Thursday (Day 3 of hartal) In Laxmipur, leaders and activists of BNP-Jamaat brought out a sudden procession in Miah Rasta area on the Laxmipur-Ramgati Road in the district town around 9:00 am and vandalised a bus and an auto-rickshaw. They also blasted five crude bombs in the area
title: On Thursday (Day 3 of hartal) In Laxmipur...
